newsitem.title: PERU: Lima bolsa postpones extension of trading hours.
newsitem.headline: Lima bolsa postpones extension of trading hours.

text.p: The Lima Stock Exchange said Friday it was postponing plans to extend operating hours from Monday.
A statement from the bolsa did not give reasons for the change in plans nor did it say when a proposed new timetable might be introduced again.

Earlier this week, the exchange had said it was increasing operating hours from Monday to between 0800 and 1600 local time (1300-2100 GMT). This was intended to allow trade on the Lima stock exchange to coincide with that on the New York Stock Exchange.
The bolsa currently opens for trading between 0900 and 1300 local time (1400-1800 GMT).
